an3.13:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo nīce kule paccājāto hoti, caṇḍālakule vā venakule vā nesādakule vā rathakārakule vā pukkusakule vā dalidde appannapānabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghāsacchādo labbhati.
an3.13:1.6: So ca hoti dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako bavhābādho kāṇo vā kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato vā, na lābhī annassa pānassa vatthassa yānassa mālāgandhavilepanassa seyyāvasathapadīpeyyassa.
an3.13:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto hoti ābhiseko anabhisitto acalappatto.
an3.13:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, rājā hoti khattiyo muddhāvasitto.
an3.13:3.8: Yā hissa, bhikkhave, pubbe anabhisittassa abhisekāsā sā paṭippassaddhā.
an3.13:3.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an3.13:4.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā bhikkhūsu.
an3.13:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujāto.
an3.13:4.7: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an3.13:4.9: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an3.13:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo.
an3.13:5.4: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an3.13:5.6: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an3.13:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ hoti khīṇāsavo.
an3.13:6.4: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an3.13:6.6: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṃ khayā …pe… sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an3.13:6.8: Yā hissa, bhikkhave, pubbe avimuttassa vimuttāsā sā paṭippassaddhā.
an3.13:6.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā bhikkhūsū”ti.
